𓅬 𓅼 𓅾 󳈤 ≠ 𓅭 𓅬 ≈ gun3 Gans @ Proto-Cuneiform 𓅬 Gämnza 𓋴𓏠𓈖𓅭 Gänse Ganter see gEnten

𓅬 goose ≈ 𓅭 γιος gios "son" υἱός huiós 𐀂-𐀍 i-jo hiljiu

Gaz (re)inverted: Sag,Sak
Armenian: սագ (hy) (sag) Belarusian: гусь f (husʹ), гуса́к m (husák) Bulgarian: гъ́ска (bg) f (gǎ́ska), гъсо́к m (gǎsók) Ukrainian: гу́ска f (húska), гуса́к m (husák), Udmurt: ӟазег (dźazeg) Komi-Zyrian: дзодзӧг (dzodzög)

Peculiar corruption cluster: gwaz gavc avaz avica avis
Hebrew: אווז \ אַוָּז \ אֲוָז (he) m (aváz) Ladin: aucia French: oie (fr) f < *auca, contraction of *avica, Norman: ouaïe f Franco-Provençal: ôye f Friulian: ocje, ocje f Sardinian: coca, oca Istriot: uoca f Catalan: oca (ca) f Romansch: auca f, ocha f Dalmatian: jauca f

Only very vew words for goose fall out of this continuos trace, e.g.
Latvian: zoss (lv) f Lithuanian: žąsis (lt) Udmurt: ӟазег (dźazeg) Komi-Zyrian: дзодзӧг (dzodzög) Cherokee: ᏌᏌ (chr) (sasa)

Chuvash: хур (hur)
Sichuan Yi: ꈭ (ggup)

Others just use the bird superroot:
Norman: pithotte f (Jersey) Georgian: ბატი (baṭi) Swahili: bata bukini Pashto: بته (ps) f (bata) Telugu: బాతు (te) (bātu), పెద్దబాతు (te) (peddabātu) Tamil: வாத்து (ta) (vāttu)
𓄿 𓊪 𓂧 𓅬 Apit > avis ዖፍ (ʿof) עוף \ עוֹף 𓄿𓅮 !
πετεινόν piteri ɸatar പറവ పిట్ట (piṭṭa®) putnys Puten Puter bird 𓊪Tier

Both roots seem connected via avis < ע]]וֹף]] < Gooƒe < Geb ꈭ

Scientific Latinized genera: Anser, Branta, Chen, Cereopsis
